name: CLARITY_UCL_FRMCHG
description: Stores the original charge from which a charge was reposted.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the charge line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REPOSTED_FRM_UCL_ID
columns.description: The original charge from which this charge was reposted
